text: Mauricio Cordeiro (born 31 December 1992 in Brazil) is a Brazilian footballer who now plays for Hapoel Afula in Israel. ==Career== Cordeiro started his senior career with Grêmio Barueri Futebol. In 2016, he signed for Hapoel Ironi Kiryat Shmona in the Israeli Premier League, where he made thirty-eight appearances and scored seven goals. After that, he played for Ashdod, Esporte Clube Vitória, and Nea Salamis Famagusta. On 10 August 2020 signed in Hapoel Afula. == References == Category:Living people Category:1992 births Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Grêmio Barueri Futebol players Category:Avaí FC players Category:Oeste Futebol Clube players Category:Mirassol Futebol Clube players Category:Red Bull Brasil players Category:Clube Atlético Penapolense players Category:Hapoel Ironi Kiryat Shmona F.C. players Category:F.C.
